main event: A UFO sighting involving one round light observed in Orlando, Florida on August 10, 1965.
interesting points: The object changed colors from red to yellow-orange, The sighting lasted for 30-45 minutes with no maneuvers observed, The object left a vapor trail when it disappeared, The object moved like a gyroscope and reflected light in a nearby lake, Two witnesses corroborated the sighting and agreed on the object's characteristics.
witness description: one observer initially, two others joined later
